name: clo
description: Create React app Running with rsbuild

scripts.preview: pnpm run build && concurrently "pnpm --filter clo_host preview" "pnpm --filter clo_remote preview"
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:ui: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --ui
scripts.test:e2e:debug: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --debug
scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm run build && pnpm exec playwright test --reporter=list
